nav.div: Regional School Unit 25 » Departments » Health Services » Coronavirus Info (COVID-19)

p.span: We have compiled a few resources for community members looking for care and actionable steps as we prepare for the new strain of Coronavirus (COVID-19). As with many infectious outbreaks, there are many precautionary steps we can take to reduce exposure and/or spreading them.

Our student's health is an important factor in their educational experience. Our Health Team will be working to inform students of many of the topics covered here. They can be reached at Nurse@rsu25.org.
